title: Exileplanet.xyz
brief: A blog platform for seamless content creation and management
bulletPoints: Built with Node.js and Express for a robust backend
Utilizes MySQL with JSON for flexible post storage
Images stored as BLOBs for efficient handling
Advanced tag indexing for quick searches
